# NSAnimation.Curve.linear

**Case**

Describes an animation in which there is no change in frame rate.

## Declaration

```swift
case linear
```

## Constants

- **NSAnimation.Curve.easeInOut**: Describes an S-curve in which the animation slowly speeds up and then slows down near the end of the animation. This constant is the default.
- **NSAnimation.Curve.easeIn**: Describes an animation that slows down as it reaches the end.
- **NSAnimation.Curve.easeOut**: Describes an animation that slowly speeds up from the start.
